Recent Doc Updates

14-April-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Display Duration
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn to display the duration of the video over the video poster that is displayed. The duration disappears when the play button is pressed.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-display-duration.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Code Samples
  • Title: Seek Buttons Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the seek buttons plugin for Brightcove Player. This plugin will allow you to seek forward/back through a video for a configurable amount of time. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/seek-buttons-plugin.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins

Major updates

  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Download Video Plugin
  • Description: This sample has a note at the top to point to the new built in Download Button Plugin document.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-download-video-plugin.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Download Button Plugin
  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Download Transcript
  • Description: This sample has a note at the top to point to the new built in Download Button Plugin document.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-download-transcript.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Download Button Plugin
  • Title: Download Button Plugin
  • Description: Steps listed in the Implement using Players module section updated
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/download-button-plugin.html#Implement_using_Players_module
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins
  • Title: React Player Loader
  • Description: onEmbedCreated information added to parameters section
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/coding-topics/react-player-loader.html#Parameters
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Coding Topics
  • Title: Implementing Server-Side Ads with Brightcove Player
  • Description: vmapURLParams information added to options section
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/implementing-server-side-ads-brightcove-player.html#Options
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Plugins

Minor updates

7-April-2023

New Brightcove Academy Courses

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Player Configuration Guide
  • Description: Added properties download_button and skip_buttons (Player v7.4.0 and above) to the configuration properties list
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/player-configuration-guide.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Player Features
